summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department (Solid Waste Utility), the Department of Human Resources, the Department of Community Development, and the Energy Office; authorizing the implementation of the Composting Strategy as adopted and defined by Resolution 26277 increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1980 Budget of the four above-mentioned departments; making appropriations from the Solid Waste Fund; making reimbursable appropriations from the General Fund and two operating funds; and authorizing the departments to enter into consultant contracts for certain purposes.
